metadataAttributes.Title: Machine Learning Foundations: A Case Study Approach
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Do you have data and wonder what it can tell you?  Do you need a deeper understanding of the core ways in which machine learning can improve your business?  Do you want to be able to converse with specialists about anything from regression and classification to deep learning and recommender systems?
metadataAttributes.Skills: Python Programming,Machine Learning Concepts,Machine Learning,Deep Learning,
